titleStmt.title: A true and perfect relation of the battail and victory lately obtained near Lewentz against twenty five thousand Turks, Tartars, and Moldavians, by General Souches: as it was sent to His Imperial Majesty, dated July 20. 1664.
titleStmt.author: Souches, Ludwig Raduit de, 1608-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Mabb, living at St. Pauls Wharff,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: A true and perfect relation of the battail and victory, lately obtained near Lewentz, as it was sent to His Imperial Majesty by General Souches.
With a final imprimatur leaf, dated: August 6. 1664.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
